# Resume

An online résumé. [Demo Site](https://demo-resume.netlify.app)

## Features

* Fully Customizable
* Semantic HTML
* Accessible (WCAG AA) 
* `h-resume` Microformat
* Spellcheck Linter
* Self-Contained (no external resources)
* Search Engine Optimized
* Critical CSS Inlined
* Print Styles

## Credits
